sections.label: Verse 1
content: A hundred days have made me older
Since the last time that I saw your pretty face
A thousand lies have made me colder
And I don't think I can look at this the same
But all the miles that separate
They disappear now, when I'm dreaming of your face

sections.label: Chorus 1
content: But you're still on my lonely mind
I think about you, baby, and I dream about you all the time
But you're still with me in my dreams
F G Am G Am F G
And tonight, there's only you and me, yeah

sections.label: Verse 2
content: As the people leave their way to say hello
I've heard this life is overrated
But I hope that it gets better as we go, ohh yeah yeah

sections.label: Chorus 2
content: But you're still on my lonely mind
I think about you, baby, and I dream about you all the time
But you're still with me in my dreams
F G Am G Am F G
And tonight, there's only you and me, yeah

sections.label: Bridge 1
content: Everything I know, and everywhere I go
It gets hard but it won't take away my love
And when the last one falls, and when it's all said and done
It gets hard, but it won't take away my love, whoa

sections.label: Chorus 3
content: But you're still on my lonely mind
I think about you, baby, and I dream about you all the time
But you're still with me in my dreams
And tonight, girl, there's only you and me, yeah, ohh yeah
